Master Svein:
Attributes influence over the player's combat characteristics and protection.
[Types of Attributes]
Spirits are bound to the four general attributes which have brought them to life: water, fire, wind and earth.
[Attribute Attack]
If a character is attacking an ordinary monster with attribute power, inflicted damage is greatly increased. If a character is attacking an elemental monster, inflicted damage will be depending on the attribute of that monster.
The effect of opposite attributes becomes apparent when two attributes encounter each other and one of them is weak while the other is strong. If you use the strong attribute versus the weak one, the full blast damage will be 130%. If you use the weak attribute versus the strong one, the full blast damage will be 10%. Attribute attacks let you deal more damage. You will deal maximum damage if you attack monsters of opposite attribute.
Correlation of opposite attributes describes how attributes influence each other. Water is stronger than fire, fire is stronger than wind, wind is stronger than earth and earth is stronger than water.
Power of one attribute depends on others', that's why it's important to master all the attributes.
[Attribute Resistance] The best attribute for your protection is the attribute damaging your character.
So learning different attributes will help yourself in combat.
